queries.name: 5aHL
queries.title: 5aHL
queries.description: * LSE doctoral theses 1926-2021 with author links to Wikipedia pages where available

queries.name: 5b4L
queries.title: 5b4L
queries.description: * Chains of doctoral students/advisors in the project (as of August 2022 the longest is 4)

queries.name: 5WYp
queries.title: 5WYp
queries.description: * Relationships between thesis supervisors and authors. Extends beyond LSE's digitised theses by drawing on Wikidata statements for people educated at or employed by LSE with a doctoral student/supervisor relationship. This is such a large dataset it will be a little slow to open

queries.name: 63Jh
queries.title: 63Jh
queries.description: * Relationships between notable thesis authors and supervisors where both have a Wikipedia page. Shown in list format and in graph format https://w.wiki/7p8V

queries.name: 5aMU
queries.title: 5aMU
queries.description: * Table of awards won by LSE thesis authors and supervisors

queries.name: 5djt
queries.title: 5djt
queries.description: * Graph, with images where available, of awards won by LSE thesis authors and supervisors

queries.name: 5aLx
queries.title: 5aLx
queries.description: * Other institutions holding archives about LSE thesis authors and supervisors

queries.name: 5d66
queries.title: 5d66
queries.description: * Graph, with images where available, showing relationships between LSE thesis authors and supervisors and archive-holding institutions

queries.name: 5aG5
queries.title: 5aG5
queries.description: * Bubble chart showing main subjects of the thesis set

queries.name: 7Kiz
queries.title: 7Kiz
queries.description: * Bubble chart showing types of main subjects (depicts what the main subject is an instance of)

queries.name: 5but
queries.title: 5but
queries.description: * Bubble chart showing field of work for LSE thesis authors and supervisors

queries.name: 5aTp
queries.title: 5aTp
queries.description: * Image grid of authors and supervisors in the LSEThesisProject, where available in Wikimedia Commons

queries.name: 5djt
queries.title: 5djt
queries.description: * Graph, with images where available, of awards won by LSE thesis authors and supervisors

queries.name: 5b3r
queries.title: 5b3r
queries.description: * Table of employers of LSE thesis authors and supervisors

queries.name: 5b49
queries.title: 5b49
queries.description: * Table of educational institutions attended by LSE thesis authors and supervisors

queries.name: 5eTJ
queries.title: 5eTJ
queries.description: * Similarly this experimental query looks for connections Wikidata could make, this time seeking works citing an LSE thesis - as of September 2022 we have our first 16 results!
